donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGO
outputs.output_descr: Capacities  of partner institutions strengthened to better plan, implement and monitor ALMMs; Models of sustainable employment Programmes improved and applied to attain targets set with the OP 2012-2013.

donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGO
outputs.output_descr: Capacities  of partner institutions strengthened to better plan, implement and monitor ALMMs; Models of sustainable employment Programmes  improved and applied to attain targets set with the OP 2013.

donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGO
outputs.output_descr: The programme will focuse on: self-employment; additional employment in micro and small companies and craftsmen shops; training in occupations demanded on the labour market, community work and other activities to increase the level of readiness of the vulnerable groups for their inclusion in the ALMMs and the labour market.

donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGO
outputs.output_descr: The project shall support the Ministry of Labour and Social Policy, Employment Service Agency, Agency for Promotion of Entrepreneurship, and Central Register in development and implementation of Active Labour Market Measures: Self-employment, Formalization of existing business and Additional employment in previously registered companies. It will also support the Ministry of Education and Science and Vocational Education and Training Centre in improving the arrangements for provision of certified  short-term training. the Programme will also support piloting of  the Labour mobility measure, as well as implementation of the Roma Employment Support activities, part of the Roma Decade action plan.

donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGO
outputs.output_descr: The project aims at development of the partnership with state/governmental bodies and agencies. In particular, it will closely collaborate with Ministry of Labour and Social Policy, Employment Service Agency, Agency for Promotion of Entrepreneurship, and Central Register in development and implementation of Active Labour Market Measures: Self-employment and Formalization of existing business. The project will support the Ministry of Education and Science and Vocational Education and Training Centre in improving the arrangements for short-term training programmes. Moreover, UNDP will provide assistance in piloting a measure for supporting the growth of the firms established with 2007 and 2008 employment  programme.

project_descr: Active labour market measures targeting the socially excluded developed and implemented.
